sentences.sContent: I found her on the seashore,dreaming away as usual.
sentences.sCn: 我在海滨找到了她，像往常一样她又在那儿发呆。

sentences.sContent: Taxpayers are grumbling about the waste of government money,as usual.
sentences.sCn: 纳税人又像往常一样抱怨政府浪费钱财。

sentences.sContent: I find him in the garden, dreaming away as usual.
sentences.sCn: 我发现他又像往常一样，在花园里失了神。

trans.tranOther: in the same way as what happens most of the time or in most cases
